instruction: Explain an AI application used in healthcare.
output: AI is being used in healthcare to automate and streamline mundane tasks, from simple data entry to more complex tasks such as medical record keeping. AI-powered chatbots are being used to provide initial patient triage and provide medical advice. AI-based medical imaging technologies are being used to diagnose diseases more quickly and accurately, allowing for better and earlier treatment. AI-based drug discovery is becoming increasingly popular, helping to accelerate the development of new medications.
